products.name: Still Guilty
products.author: Erik Schneider
products.description: The author as a young boy breaks his mother's discman and he still feels guilty about it.
products.details: 12 pgs. Black and Mahagony ink on French Paper 70#T Poptone Sweettooth. Edition of 100.

products.name: Help!
products.author: Christine Gutierrez
products.description: Help your community grow, achieve, learn, and build! It's amazing what a helping hand can do.
products.details: 8 pgs. Black and Mahagony ink on French Paper 70#T Poptone Sweettooth. Edition of 50.

products.name: Hecho en Mexico
products.author: Christine Gutierrez
products.details: Blue and Yellow ink on French Paper 100#C Contruction Whitewash. Edition of 40.

products.name: Flying Trash
products.author: Erik Schneider
products.description: A couple of minutes in the life of an average seagull that end up cooler than expected.
products.details: 28 pgs. Green ink on French Paper 70#T Pop-Tone Banana Split. Edition of 55.

products.name: The Dead Sound
author: Tim Beard
Dave Scheidt
products.description: A skeleton band reunites for one last time to play a gig on Halloween night.
products.details: 16 pgs. Black ink on French Paper 70#T Pop-Tone Lemon Drop and 65#C Pop-Tone Orange Fizz. Edition of 200.

products.name: Shots
products.author: Jacob Halton
products.description: A man struggles with regret as he attempts to sink one last free-throw.
products.details: 16 pgs. Black ink on French Paper 70#T Construction Recycled White and 65#C Pop-Tone Orange Fizz. Edition of 100.

products.name: Trade-Off
products.author: Christine Gutierrez
products.description: An exploration of lighting and tone comparing familiar objects of the city and countryside
products.details: 16 pgs. Black and blue ink on French Paper 50#T Dur-O-Tone Newspaper White. Edition of 50.

products.name: Whitey's Woods
products.author: Erik Schneider
products.description: A short essay reflecting on the single image the author conjures when he thinks of home.
products.details: Black, green, and blue ink on French Paper 80#C Construction Whitewash. Edition of 50.

products.name: Nothing Special
products.author: Lane Fujita
products.description: A trip to Japan reconnects the author with his family and heritage.
products.details: 24 pgs. Laminated gold foil adheared to toner on French Paper 80#C Construction Electric Red with black Risograph on general newsprint interiors. Edition of 75.

products.name: Handout Comics No. 4
products.author: Various Artists
products.description: The 2015 edition of a free minicomic featuring several local artists.
products.details: 32 pgs. Black ink on French Paper 50#T Dur-O-Tone Newspaper Aged. Edition of 300.

products.name: Nordhouse
products.author: Erik Schneider
products.description: Three friends meet for a camping trip at the Nordhouse Dunes in western Michigan where drinking leads to quiet moments of self-reflection and comradery.
products.details: 48 pgs. Blue and green ink on French Paper 70#T and 80#C Construction Whitewash. Edition of 100.

products.name: To-Do
products.author: Erik Schneider
products.description: An organized vigilante uses his skills in project managment to out-plan a criminal.
products.details: 28 pgs. Blue and black ink on French Paper 80#C Construction Whitewash and one color black Risograph interiors on French Paper 50#T Dur-O-Tone Newspaper White. Edition of 80.
